Transcript:
Brooke: 
By the end of the day, I'll be Mrs. Ridge Forrester. Again.

Hope: Mommy!

Brooke: Hey, honey. Come here. Up on the bed.

Hope: It's so fancy downstairs.

Brooke: I told you, we're having a wedding today.

Hope: Will Uncle Nick be there?

Brooke: No.

Hope: Do I have to go?

Brooke: I know you love Uncle Nick. I do, too. But he can't be here all the 
time.

Hope: Why not?

Brooke: Because he has his own life.

Hope: I wish you were marrying Uncle Nick.

Brooke: You love Ridge, too.

Hope: I know, but I still wish you were marrying Uncle Nick.

Brooke: Hey, we really want you to be our flower girl today.

Hope: But I have school.

Brooke: It's okay, you can miss school for one day.

Hope: But I want to go to school.

Brooke: Okay. Why don't you have Catherine help you get ready, okay? Sweetie, 
Uncle Nick will already be in our hearts. He'll be right here. And right here. 
We can't always have what we want. Everything's going to be perfect. I promise 
you. Just perfect. Come here.

-------------------------------------

Eric: Ridge, good, you're here. I want to see you for a minute.

Ridge: What's up?

Eric: Listen, this thing is happening very very quickly.

Ridge: This wedding has waited long enough, Dad. 

Eric: I know you're ready for it. But is Brooke?

If you're worried about Nick, he couldn't be further from her mind.

Eric: Are you sure?

Ridge: Absolutely positive. She's as committed to this as I am.

--------------------------------------

Stephanie: I want to talk to you.

Brooke: You mean talk me out of marrying your son.

Stephanie: If it's possible.

Brooke: It's not.

Stephanie: Then answer me one question.

Brooke: One question.

Stephanie: Are you absolutely sure that you want to spend the rest of your life 
with my son?

Brooke: Yes.

Stephanie: But Nick is free.

Brooke: Nick is devastated. He just lost his child. And then he finds out that 
Dominick isn't even his son. He's hurting, Stephanie.

Stephanie: You could be there to comfort him.

Brooke: Oh my God. I can't even believe you're encouraging me to go after my 
daughter's husband now, when she needs him the most.

Stephanie: What she needs the most is honesty. Brooke, you married Eric. It 
didn't take away your feelings for Nick. You marry Ridge, that's not going to 
take away what you feel for --

Brooke: That's it. I don't want to hear one more word.

Ridge: Neither do I.

Stephanie: Ridge.

Ridge: Why won't you leave her alone?

Stephanie: Will you at least please talk to Nick?

Brooke: No. Nick and Bridget are committed to each other. They're happily 
married and nothing is going to change that.

----------------------------------

Nick: Morning. How are you?

Bridget: I'm okay.

Nick: How'd you sleep?

Bridget: Didn't really. I was up most the night thinking.

Nick: Me, too.

Bridget: And?

Nick: And you're my wife and I love you.

Bridget: I never questioned your love for me.

Nick: Well, then what is it? Is it your love for me?

Bridget: No. No, I love you more now than I probably ever have.

Nick: Well, then what are we doing?

Bridget: We're discussing our future.

Nick: Good. Good, let's do that.

Bridget: Nick, we're always going to be a part of each other's lives. We're just 
not going to be husband and wife.

Nick: So you haven't changed your mind.

Bridget: Have you? I'm sorry, Nick, I cannot go on with this marriage. Not when 
you won't try to be a father to Dominick. Not when I know you're in love with my 
mother.

---------------------------------------

[Doorbell rings]

Eric: Reverend, there you are. Hi. Come in, come in.

Darla: So is Bridget upstairs helping Brooke get ready?

Jackie: I don't think she's feeling up to it.

Thorne: I thought she and Nick were doing better.

Jackie: Unfortunately, they got more bad news last night. Now's not the time to 
actually --

Massimo: Jacqueline, if something's going on with our son, I would like to know.

Jackie: I knew I shouldn't have brought it up.

Massimo: But you did.

All right. If you must know -- Dominick isn't Nick's son.

[Massimo sighs and clears throat]

------------------------------------------

Brooke: This tragedy is not going to derail Nick and Bridget's marriage.

Ridge: This is not about Nick and Bridget.

Stephanie: You're so right. It's all about Nick and Brooke.

Ridge: Oh, will you stop? Look, this is our wedding day, Mother. If you can't 
support it, then get the hell outta here.

Brooke: [Sighs] God. Maybe we should have eloped.

Ridge: Yeah, I'm inclined to agree. But we've been there and done that.

Brooke: It's not so much your mom, it's also what Bridget's been going through, 
and Felicia.

Ridge: I feel like everyone could use a little something to celebrate right now. 
Are we still on?

Brooke: Yes.

Ridge: I will never disappoint you, Logan. I will never ever take you for 
granted again. I did that once, assuming you'd always be there for me. It scared 
the hell out of me to find out just how wrong I was. I know your love died -- 
your love for me died when I left you and Hope and R.J. I had to earn it back. 
Now that I've done that, it means more to me than it ever has. I love you so 
much.

Brooke: I love you, too.

Ridge: Nothing and nobody is going to get in the way of our happiness today.

Brooke: Nope. 

Ridge: Nope.

Brooke: Nobody.

Ridge: I'll see you downstairs.

Brooke: My makeup.

[Brooke giggles]

Nick: Bridget? I'm not doing this. I want to save this marriage.

Bridget: I love you for that, but I know when something is past saving.

Nick: Oh, please. I mean, my God, give us a break. I mean, we have been going 
through some hard times, don't you agree?

Bridget: But we've been going through hard times for a while.

Nick: That is not true.

Bridget: Nick, I'm just seeing things from a whole different perspective. Losing 
Nicole and finding out that Dominick wasn't your son made me realize that you 
can't freeze life in one perfect place. It's always going to change. No matter 
how bad or how good things are, life is going to change. If we really want to be 
happy, we just have to accept that. Accept things the way they really are and 
try to go on from there.

Nick: And we can go on from there. I agree with you. We can have another child.

That's not the answer.

Nick: Well, neither is giving up.

Bridget: I'm not giving up anything. I don't have to stop loving Dominick just 
because he's not your son. And, I can love you and still let you go.

Nick: Let me go? Because I wont' be a father to Dominick.

Bridget: I do understand why you won't. I think it's a shame because I know that 
you would be an incredible father.

Nick: And I want that. I want to be a father.

Bridget: And you will be. To Hope. You can raise Hope and R.J. with my mother. 
You can go and make a life with them starting today. It's okay.
